name: Yam Enchiladas
description: Cheesy tomato flavour coupled with antioxidant-rich yams makes this dish delish—and in less than 20 minutes!
preparation: Combine yams and Dip Mix in a Multipurpose or Square Steamer. Cover and microwave on high for 3–4 minutes. Mash lightly with the back of a fork.
Fill tortillas with yam mixture. Roll and place seam-side down in a Multipurpose or Square Steamer.
Stir Nacho Cheese Dip Seasoning into the diced tomatoes, and pour over rolled tortillas.
Sprinkle with cheese, cover with lid, and microwave on high for 5 minutes.

products.name: Guacamole Dip Mix
summary: An all-natural blend of sweet peppers, garlic, and chilies comes together to create the perfect guacamole––minus the sodium and additives!

products.name: Nacho Cheese Dip Mix
summary: A delicious blend of bold chili with real Parmesan makes for a creamy nacho cheese dip or seasoning.

products.name: Square Steamer
summary: Cook desserts, healthy meals and side dishes in minutes in your microwave!

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
